title: Improved photocatalytic carbon dioxide reduction over Bi-doped CeO2 by strain engineering
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1405-1411
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01680C, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ang Tian, Ziyu Mei, Luyuan Wang, Guangliang Liu, Zhiguo Liu, Guangming Kong, Wenjun Tang, Chuangwei Liu
By creating surface vacancy-dopant-mediated solid frustrated Lewis pairs, efficient photochemical conversion of CO2 to formic acid is achieved on Bi-doped CeO2 in the presence of strain, which is investigated by using density functional theory.
